title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 333.12 - Termination of appointment as chair
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 333.12 - Termination of appointment as chair

State Regulations

If the chair of a department or division of a college is
relieved of duties as chair, that academic staff member shall retain such
rights and privileges as he or she may have by virtue of academic
rank. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
333.12

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
